name: 20 Slot Fractal Exotic Equipment Box
description: 20 Slot. If possible, weapons and armor of exotic rarity will fill this box before other empty spaces.

name: 20 Slot Fractal Rare Equipment Box
description: 20 Slot. If possible, weapons and armor of rare rarity will fill this box before other empty spaces.

name: Wintersday Mystery Box
description: Contains up to five personalized Wintersday gifts, plus an additional themed item. Contents include tonics, mortars, and red and green dyes. Chests could also contain new mini pets and rare themed weapon skin tickets.

name: Winter's Needle Dagger Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other dagger.

name: 20 Slot Fractal Bag
description: 20 Slot

name: Dessa's Experiment Journal
description: Double-click to gain one spirit shard.

name: Winter Warband Festive Mortar
description: Double-click to create a mortar at your location.

name: Drip of Liquid Karma
description: Double-click to gain karma.

name: 20 Slot Fractal Uncommon Equipment Box
description: 20 Slot. If possible, weapons and armor of uncommon rarity will fill this box before other empty spaces.

name: Mini Snowman
description: Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.

name: Winter's Shelter Shield Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other shield.

name: Unsafe Wintersday Gift
description: <c=@flavor>Warning: small parts. Not for children. Double-click to open.</c>

name: Unbreakable Choir Bell
description: Double-click to pull out a choir bell and play for your friends.

name: Toy Ventari Tonic
description: Double-click to transform into a Wintersday toy for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

name: Exquisite Snowflake
description: Double-click to apply to an accessory, amulet, or ring with an unused upgrade slot.

name: Disasembler 3BEK Kit
description: Double-click to salvage crafting materials from an item in your inventory. 10% chance of rarer materials. 20% chance of recovering upgrades.

name: Small Wintersday Gift
description: Double-click to open.

name: Winter's Reach Longbow Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other longbow.

name: Winter's Weapon Claim Ticket
description: Take this ticket to Evon Gnashblade at the Lion's Arch trading post to select a Wintersday weapon skin.

name: Fancy Winter Outfit
description:
Contains a Winter Outfit, which is usable in combat, and a Crystal Scepter toy for costume brawl.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Enchanted Combat Boost
description: Activate to choose a combat boost that will last for one hour.

description: Double-click to apply this look to any other one-handed sword.

description: Double-click to transform into a festive golem. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

name: Festive Hat
description:
Town clothes can no longer be equipped separately.

Speak to a Black Lion Armor Trader in any major city to exchange this for a helmet skin with the same look.
